title.@value: Combination or interaction of operator error and device failure without injury or harm

definition.@value: Combination of device failure (structural or functional) and process/procedural error (poor training, maintenance, incorrect installation) in device use or maintenance without documented injury or harm.

label.@value: Combination or interaction of operator error and device failure, as mode of injury or harm
Combination or interaction of operator error and device failure without injury or harm
